description: Defines an abstract class 'DataSource' providing an interface for data operations related to vehicles, groups, and events in a fleet management system.

classes.name: DataSource
classes.description: Abstract class specifying methods for initializing data, and CRUD operations for Vehicles, Groups, and Events.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Method to initialize underlying storage or seed data.

methods.name: getGroups
methods.description: Fetches a list of business groups.

methods.name: getEvents
methods.description: Fetches a list of maintenance events.
